description: [Playcrypt](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1162) can use AlphaVSS to delete shadow copies.(Citation: Trend Micro Ransomware Spotlight Play July 2023)

external_references.description: Trend Micro Research. (2023, July 21). Ransomware Spotlight: Play. Retrieved September 24, 2024.
